resources.string: Studio Ghibli won an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature for \"Spirited Away.\"
\"Howl\'s Moving Castle\" is directed by Hayao Miyazaki.
Interstellar won an Academy Award for Best Cinematography.
In \"Fight Club,\" Brad Pitt\'s character is named Tyler Durden.
In \"Bee Movie,\" the bees decide to sue humans for stealing honey.
